hero: A better way to manage product feedback
subhero: Open-source Ideation Tool for Feedback, Roadmap and Announcements
ask-your-customers-for-feedback-on-your-: Ask your customers for feedback on your product and extract valuable ideas.
find-the-most-valuable-features-from-the: Find the most valuable features from the most important customers.
become-a-customer-centric-organization-w: Become a customer-centric organization with transparent customer-driven product development.
hassle-free-scalable-solution-with: Hassle-free scalable solution with pay for what you use pricing. Cheaper than hosting it yourself.
open-source-with-no-limitations-own: Open-source with no limitations. Own your data and manage it on your own infrastructure.
pre-packaged-with-feedback: Pre-packaged with Feedback, Roadmap and Announcements.
quickly-address-incoming-feedback-respon: Quickly address incoming feedback: respond, shelve, merge it or convert it to a task.
plan-out-your-roadmap-with-a-kanban: Plan out your roadmap with a Kanban style drag-n-drop UI.
try-it-out-yourself-for-free-and: Try it out yourself for free and customize it even further.
build-software-with-us-for: Build software with us for the whole community or host an instance on your own infrastructure.
you-can-always-customize-later-for: You can always customize later for your needs. Please pick the most suitable function for you.
customer-first-feedback-experience-for: Customer-first feedback experience for capturing unbiased feedback.
embrace-community-discussion-around: Embrace community discussion around your product.
feedback-collected-within-a-private: Feedback collected within a private group or organization.
for-advanced-use-cases-start: For advanced use-cases, start without pre-defined templates.
give-us-a-few-more-details-about-your-pr: Give us a few more details about your project.
youve-created-your-project-invite: You've created {{projectName}}. Invite your teammates to explore together.
first-lets-capture-feedback-from-a-custo: First let's capture feedback from a customer.
creates-a-task-and-places-it-on-your: Creates a task and places it on your roadmap. Feedback is marked as Accepted, linked to your task, and all subscribers notified.
for-duplicate-or-related-ideas-merge-tog: For duplicate or related ideas, merge together with existing feedback or link it to an existing task.
these-are-tasks-that-are-in-an-ideation: These are tasks that are in an ideation stage. They are shown to users to gather feedback but do not show up in the public roadmap.
this-is-where-you-show-off-your: This is where you show off your roadmap to your users. Feel free to adjust the titles, colors and columns in the settings.
after-your-finish-a-task-drop-it-in-here: After your finish a task, drop it in here.
we-will-combine-these-into-a: We will combine these into an announcement in the next tutorial.
lets-create-your-first-task-on: Let's create your first task on the public roadmap.
and-drag-me-around-the-roadmap: And drag me around the roadmap.
optionally-you-can-link-to-your: Optionally you can link to your completed tasks or feedback here
useful-if-you-are-not-quite-ready: Useful if you are not quite ready to publish yet. Drafts are private to you only. I keep a draft open at all times and add any completed tasks on the go.
this-will-take-you-to-the-publicly: This will take you to the publicly accessible portal. If you set it to private, you will be asked to sign-in first.
choose-whether-you-want-to-have: Choose whether you want to have your portal publicly available.
choose-how-users-can-sign-up: Choose how users can sign up
choose-how-your-users-can-sign: Choose how your users can sign-up here
setup-a-custom-domain-for-your-portal: Setup a custom domain for your portal
first-you-need-to-configure-your-dns: First you need to configure your DNS settings to point your domain "example.com" as a CNAME of "{{cname}}"
type-in-your-custom-domain-here: Type in your custom domain here.
invite-your-teammates-to-explore-togethe: Invite your teammates to explore together
send-your-teammate-an-invitation-by: Send your teammate an invitation by email to join your project.
install-the-portal-on-your-website: Install the portal on your website
copy-the-following-html-into-your-websit: Copy the following HTML into your website.
type-in-your-credit-card-information: Type in your credit card information
how-to-manage-feedback-roadmap-and-chang: How to manage feedback, roadmap and announcements
are-you-sure-you-want-to-discard-all-you: Are you sure you want to discard all your configuration changes?
first-and-foremost-capture-customers-own: First and foremost, capture customers' own words. Intended for detail-oriented product managers.
show-your-customers-a-public: Show your customers a public feedback forum to discuss each other's ideas. A hands-off approach to let the community manage feedback for you.
choose-between-feedback-first-or: Choose between Feedback-First or Customer-First options
